TypeSignature.Value: public class CursorWrapper : Java.Lang.Object, Android.Database.ICursor, IDisposable

.class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CursorWrapper extends Java.Lang.Object implements class Android.Database.ICursor, class Android.Runtime.IJavaObject, class Java.IO.ICloseable, class System.IDisposable

Docs.summary: Wrapper class for Cursor that delegates all calls to the actual cursor object.

remarks.para: Wrapper class for Cursor that delegates all calls to the actual cursor object. The primary use for this class is to extend a cursor while overriding only a subset of its methods.

remarks.para: Creates a cursor wrapper.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Close() cil managed

Docs.summary: Closes the Cursor, releasing all of its resources and making it completely invalid.

remarks.para: Closes the Cursor, releasing all of its resources and making it completely invalid. Unlike a call to will not make the Cursor valid again.

Docs.summary: Return total number of columns

remarks.para: Return total number of columns

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual void CopyStringToBuffer (int columnIndex, Android.Database.CharArrayBuffer buffer);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void CopyStringToBuffer(int32 columnIndex, class Android.Database.CharArrayBuffer buffer) cil managed

Docs.param: the zero-based index of the target column. if the target column is null, return buffer
the buffer to copy the text into.
Docs.summary: Retrieves the requested column text and stores it in the buffer provided.

remarks.para: Retrieves the requested column text and stores it in the buffer provided. If the buffer size is not sufficient, a new char buffer will be allocated and assigned to CharArrayBuffer.data

Docs.summary: Returns the numbers of rows in the cursor.

remarks.para: Returns the numbers of rows in the cursor.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Deactivate() cil managed

Docs.summary: Deactivates the Cursor, making all calls on it fail until is called.

remarks.para: Deactivates the Cursor, making all calls on it fail until is called. Inactive Cursors use fewer resources than active Cursors. Calling will make the cursor active again.

Docs.summary: Returns a bundle of extra values.

remarks.para: Returns a bundle of extra values. This is an optional way for cursors to provide out-of-band metadata to their users. One use of this is for reporting on the progress of network requests that are required to fetch data for the cursor.
These values may only change when requery is called.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance unsigned int8[] GetBlob(int32 columnIndex) cil managed

Docs.param: the zero-based index of the target column.
Docs.summary: Returns the value of the requested column as a byte array.

remarks.para: Returns the value of the requested column as a byte array.
The result and whether this method throws an exception when the column value is null or the column type is not a blob type is implementation-defined.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 GetColumnIndex(string columnName) cil managed

Docs.param: the name of the target column.
Docs.summary: Returns the zero-based index for the given column name, or -1 if the column doesn't exist.

remarks.para: Returns the zero-based index for the given column name, or -1 if the column doesn't exist. If you expect the column to exist use instead, which will make the error more clear.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 GetColumnIndexOrThrow(string columnName) cil managed

Docs.param: the name of the target column.
Docs.summary: Returns the zero-based index for the given column name, or throws if the column doesn't exist.

remarks.para: Returns the zero-based index for the given column name, or throws if the column doesn't exist. If you're not sure if a column will exist or not use and check for -1, which is more efficient than catching the exceptions.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance string GetColumnName(int32 columnIndex) cil managed

Docs.param: the zero-based index of the target column.
Docs.summary: Returns the column name at the given zero-based column index.

remarks.para: Returns the column name at the given zero-based column index.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance string[] GetColumnNames() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns a string array holding the names of all of the columns in the result set in the order in which they were listed in the result.

remarks.para: Returns a string array holding the names of all of the columns in the result set in the order in which they were listed in the result.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance float64 GetDouble(int32 columnIndex) cil managed

Docs.param: the zero-based index of the target column.
Docs.summary: Returns the value of the requested column as a double.

remarks.para: Returns the value of the requested column as a double.

The result and whether this method throws an exception when the column value is null, the column type is not a floating-point type, or the floating-point value is not representable as a double value is implementation-defined.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance float32 GetFloat(int32 columnIndex) cil managed

Docs.param: the zero-based index of the target column.
Docs.summary: Returns the value of the requested column as a float.

remarks.para: Returns the value of the requested column as a float.

The result and whether this method throws an exception when the column value is null, the column type is not a floating-point type, or the floating-point value is not representable as a float value is implementation-defined.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 GetInt(int32 columnIndex) cil managed

Docs.param: the zero-based index of the target column.
Docs.summary: Returns the value of the requested column as an int.

remarks.para: Returns the value of the requested column as an int.

The result and whether this method throws an exception when the column value is null, the column type is not an integral type, or the integer value is outside the range [Integer.MIN_VALUE, Integer.MAX_VALUE] is implementation-defined.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int64 GetLong(int32 columnIndex) cil managed

The result and whether this method throws an exception when the column value is null, the column type is not an integral type, or the integer value is outside the range [Long.MIN_VALUE, Long.MAX_VALUE] is implementation-defined.

remarks.para: Returns the value of the requested column as a short.

The result and whether this method throws an exception when the column value is null, the column type is not an integral type, or the integer value is outside the range [Short.MIN_VALUE, Short.MAX_VALUE] is implementation-defined.

Docs.param: the zero-based index of the target column.

remarks.para: Returns data type of the given column's value. The preferred type of the column is returned but the data may be converted to other types as documented in the get-type methods such as , etc.
Returned column types are

Docs.summary: Returns whether the cursor is pointing to the position after the last row.

remarks.para: Returns whether the cursor is pointing to the position after the last row.

Docs.summary: Returns whether the cursor is pointing to the position before the first row.

remarks.para: Returns whether the cursor is pointing to the position before the first row.

Docs.summary: return true if the cursor is closed

remarks.para: return true if the cursor is closed

Docs.summary: Returns whether the cursor is pointing to the first row.

remarks.para: Returns whether the cursor is pointing to the first row.

Docs.summary: Returns whether the cursor is pointing to the last row.

remarks.para: Returns whether the cursor is pointing to the last row.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool IsNull(int32 columnIndex) cil managed

Docs.param: the zero-based index of the target column.
Docs.summary: Returns true if the value in the indicated column is null.

remarks.para: Returns true if the value in the indicated column is null.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool Move(int32 offset) cil managed

Docs.param: the offset to be applied from the current position.
Docs.summary: Move the cursor by a relative amount, forward or backward, from the current position.

remarks.para: Move the cursor by a relative amount, forward or backward, from the current position. Positive offsets move forwards, negative offsets move backwards. If the final position is outside of the bounds of the result set then the resultant position will be pinned to -1 or count() depending on whether the value is off the front or end of the set, respectively.

This method will return true if the requested destination was reachable, otherwise, it returns false. For example, if the cursor is at currently on the second entry in the result set and move(-5) is called, the position will be pinned at -1, and false will be returned.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool MoveToFirst() cil managed

Docs.summary: Move the cursor to the first row.

remarks.para: Move the cursor to the first row.
This method will return false if the cursor is empty.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool MoveToLast() cil managed

Docs.summary: Move the cursor to the last row.

remarks.para: Move the cursor to the last row.
This method will return false if the cursor is empty.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool MoveToNext() cil managed

Docs.summary: Move the cursor to the next row.

remarks.para: Move the cursor to the next row.
This method will return false if the cursor is already past the last entry in the result set.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool MoveToPosition(int32 position) cil managed

Docs.param: the zero-based position to move to.
Docs.summary: Move the cursor to an absolute position.

remarks.para: Move the cursor to an absolute position. The valid range of values is -1 <= position <= count.
This method will return true if the request destination was reachable, otherwise, it returns false.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool MoveToPrevious() cil managed

Docs.summary: Move the cursor to the previous row.

remarks.para: Move the cursor to the previous row.
This method will return false if the cursor is already before the first entry in the result set.

Docs.summary: Return the URI at which notifications of changes in this Cursor's data will be delivered, as previously set by .

remarks.para: Return the URI at which notifications of changes in this Cursor's data will be delivered, as previously set by .

Docs.summary: Returns the current position of the cursor in the row set.

remarks.para: Returns the current position of the cursor in the row set. The value is zero-based. When the row set is first returned the cursor will be at positon -1, which is before the first row. After the last row is returned another call to next() will leave the cursor past the last entry, at a position of count().

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void RegisterContentObserver(class Android.Database.ContentObserver observer) cil managed

Docs.param: the object that gets notified when the content backing the cursor changes.
Docs.summary: Register an observer that is called when changes happen to the content backing this cursor.

remarks.para: Register an observer that is called when changes happen to the content backing this cursor. Typically the data set won't change until is called.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void RegisterDataSetObserver(class Android.Database.DataSetObserver observer) cil managed

Docs.param: the object that gets notified when the cursors data set changes.
Docs.summary: Register an observer that is called when changes happen to the contents of the this cursors data set, for example, when the data set is changed via , , or .

remarks.para: Register an observer that is called when changes happen to the contents of the this cursors data set, for example, when the data set is changed via , , or .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool Requery() cil managed

Docs.summary: Performs the query that created the cursor again, refreshing its contents.

remarks.para:
Performs the query that created the cursor again, refreshing its contents. This may be done at any time, including after a call to .
Since this method could execute a query on the database and potentially take a while, it could cause ANR if it is called on Main (UI) thread. A warning is printed if this method is being executed on Main thread.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Android.OS.Bundle Respond(class Android.OS.Bundle extras) cil managed

Docs.param: extra values, or . Never null.
Docs.summary: This is an out-of-band way for the the user of a cursor to communicate with the cursor.

remarks.para: This is an out-of-band way for the the user of a cursor to communicate with the cursor. The structure of each bundle is entirely defined by the cursor.
One use of this is to tell a cursor that it should retry its network request after it reported an error.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual void SetNotificationUri (Android.Content.ContentResolver cr, Android.Net.Uri uri);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SetNotificationUri(class Android.Content.ContentResolver cr, class Android.Net.Uri uri) cil managed

Docs.param: The content resolver from the caller's context. The listener attached to this resolver will be notified.
The content URI to watch.
Docs.summary: Register to watch a content URI for changes.

remarks.para: Register to watch a content URI for changes. This can be the URI of a specific data row (for example, "content://my_provider_type/23"), or a a generic URI for a content type.

Docs.summary: This API supports the Mono for Android infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
Docs.value: A which contains the java.lang.Class JNI value corresponding to this type.

remarks.para: This property is used to control which jclass is provided to methods like .

Docs.summary: This API supports the Mono for Android infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
Docs.value: A which provides the declaring type.

remarks.para: This property is used to control virtual vs. non virtual method dispatch against the underlying JNI object. When this property is equal to the declaring type, then virtual method invocation against the JNI object is performed; otherwise, we assume that the method was overridden by a derived type, and perform non-virtual methdo invocation.

Docs.summary: onMove() will only be called across processes if this method returns true.
